time 59 hours status nowhere close to done  danganronpa 2 goodbye despair holds legendary status in the franchise for a reason the game takes the good of danganronpa 1 and cranks it to 11 while this games plot loses a lot of the thriller enviornments that the first entry placed us in it doesnt take away from the despair and suspense of the situation moving hilarious angering all these feelings and more is what this rollercoaster has to offer   1010
